labelord.basePrinter module¶

class labelord.basePrinter.BasePrinter¶

Bases: object

Class for various printing types.

Attributes:
repos (set): All repositories. errors (int): Count of errors.
ERROR_SUMMARY = '{} error(s) in total, please check log above'¶
EVENT_CREATE = 'ADD'¶
EVENT_DELETE = 'DEL'¶
EVENT_LABELS = 'LBL'¶
EVENT_UPDATE = 'UPD'¶
RESULT_DRY = 'DRY'¶
RESULT_ERROR = 'ERR'¶
RESULT_SUCCESS = 'SUC'¶
SUCCESS_SUMMARY = '{} repo(s) updated successfully'¶
add_repo(slug)¶

Adds a repository to the class variable repos.

Args:
slug (str): A GitHub repository slug.
event(event, result, repo, *args)¶

This method is called when event is printed.

In this parent method only counting errors. Args:

event (str): Which event has been use on the repo. result (str): Result repo: repository
summary()¶

This method prints summary for each event.

This method has been overridden in children classes.

labelord.communicator module¶

class labelord.communicator.GitHub(token, session=None)¶

Bases: object

This class is for connection with GitHub.

Attributes:
token (str): The token to be used for authorization with GitHub. session (Session): A Requests session to be used to send and receive data from GitHub API.
GH_API_ENDPOINT = 'https://api.github.com'¶
create_label(repository, name, color, **kwargs)¶

Create new label in given repository.

Args:
repository (str): Name of repository. name (str): Name of label. color (str): Color of new label.
delete_label(repository, name, **kwargs)¶

Delete existing label in given repository.

Args:
repository (str): Name of repository. name (str): Name of label to be deleted.
list_labels(repository)¶

Get dict of labels with colors for given repository slug

Returns:
dictionary where key and value is str: A mapping of color to each label in the given repository.
list_repositories()¶

Get list of names of accessible repositories (including owner)

Returns:
list of str: The full names of each repository.
set_session(session)¶

Sets the session and authorizes it for communicate with GitHub API.

Args:
session (Session): A Requests session.
update_label(repository, name, color, old_name=None, **kwargs)¶

Update existing label in given repository.

Args:
repository (str): Name of repository. name (str): Name of new label. color (str): Color of new label. old_name (str): Name of old label.
static webhook_verify_signature(data, signature, secret, encoding='utf-8')¶

Verifies the signature from webhook if is correct.

More details on https://developer.github.com/webhooks/securing/.

Args:

data (str): Data for verification. signature (str): Signature. secret (str): Application’s GitHub API secret. encoding (str): Encoding of the secret.
exception labelord.communicator.GitHubError(response)¶

Bases: Exception

This exception is thrown when is error with the GitHub connection.

Attributes:
status_code (int): The status code from the response. message (str): Error message from the response.
code_message¶

labelord.helper module¶

labelord.helper.create_config(config_filename=None, token=None)¶

Method for load a config file from the local storage.

If config no exists, creates a new configuration.

Args:
config_filename (str): Path config file. token (str): A GitHub token.
Returns:
ConfigParser: Configuration from config file.
labelord.helper.extract_labels(gh, template_opt, cfg)¶

Method for extracting labels from the config file or the template repository.

Args:
gh (GitHub): A GitHub object. template_opt (str): A template repository. cfg: (ConfigParser): Current configuration.
Returns:
dictionary where key and value is str: A mapping of color to each label in the given repository.
labelord.helper.extract_repos(cfg)¶

Method for extracting repositories from the configuration.

Args:
cfg: (ConfigParser): Current configuration.
Returns:
list ([str]): A list of repositories.
labelord.helper.get_labels_from_json(labels)¶

Method for parsed labels from the json data.

labelord.helper.get_repos_from_json(repos)¶

Method for parsed repos from the json data.

labelord.helper.gh_error_return(github_error)¶

Return a GitHub request status code.

Args:
github_error (GitHubError): an exception object representing the error
labelord.helper.pick_printer(verbose, quiet)¶

Pick the correct printer, based on verbosity. Returns:

BasePrinter: VerbosePrinter or QuietPrinter or Printer.
labelord.helper.pick_runner(dry_run)¶

Pick the correct runner.

If dry_run is picked, the program won’t do any changes.

labelord.helper.retrieve_github_client(ctx)¶

Retrieve the GitHub object.

If GitHub not exists, function exits the program.

Args:
ctx: click context.
Returns:
GitHub: The GitHub object.

labelord.runModes module¶

class labelord.runModes.DryRunProcessor(github, printer=None)¶

Bases: labelord.runModes.RunProcessor

This run processor is child class from RunProcessor, but does not make any changes.

class labelord.runModes.RunModes¶

Bases: object

This class is to declare various modes the program.

classmethod replace_mode(labels, labels_specs)¶

This method is for update mode.

This method do same as update_mode, but also do delete action.

Returns:
tuple of dictionary: A tuple of the resulting action dictionaries.
classmethod update_mode(labels, labels_specs)¶

This method is for update mode.

For each label compare if is in repo, if not create or update.

Returns:
tuple of dictionary: A tuple of the resulting action dictionaries.
class labelord.runModes.RunProcessor(github, printer=None)¶

Bases: object

This class is main class for logic. Attributes:

github (GitHub): GitHub instance. printer (BasePrinter): A printer responsible for printing result.

run(slugs, labels_specs, mode)¶

For each repository run changes.
